name: Nutz 'N' Junk
description:
A game developed for the Gunner Parade '22 Game Jam hosted by Team Overloaded.

The squirrel wars have had a terrible effect on the earth. Aliens have been attacking and are now threatening to blow it all up in 3 minutes! take down as many as you can. What ever isn't nutz, is junk!

Don't forget to put your score in the comments!

Controls:

Up - Up Arrow

Down - Down Arrow

Left - Left Arrow

Right - You know

Shoot/Pass Text - Spacebar

Bomb - Z

Exit - Esc
